description: This file implements the TLS cryptographic provider's decryption functions, including handling various algorithms such as DES, 3DES, IDEA, RC2, RC4, and AES. It provides an abstraction layer to perform decryption operations based on specified cipher algorithms within a TLS environment.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoDecrypt(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG cipher_algorithm,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs decryption based on the specified cipher algorithm by dispatching to the appropriate decryption function.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoDecrypt_DES(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs DES decryption using the crypto object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoDecrypt_3DES(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs 3DES decryption using the crypto object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoDecrypt_IDEA(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs IDEA decryption using the crypto object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoDecrypt_RC2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs RC2 decryption using the crypto object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoDecrypt_RC4(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs RC4 decryption using the crypto object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoDecrypt_AES(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs AES decryption using the crypto object.
